PSY317L Guides James P. Curley & Tyler M. Milewski June 28, 2020 1 Welcome to PSY317! The following is a simple guide to R studio.

2 Data Visualization The package ggplot2 is used to visualize data. Before starting you should load the tidyverse package, which includes ggplot2 and other tools, at the very top of your script. See example below. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ---------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.2 v purrr 0.3.3 ## v tibble 3.0.0 v dplyr 0.8.5 ## v tidyr 1.0.2 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.3.1 v forcats 0.5.0 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() You need to do it once for every script.
